sentences.en: We have lived in an age of wanton waste, and there is value in practicing conservation that goes far beyond our own bottom line.
sentences.cn: 我们生活在一个肆意浪费的时代，保护环境的价值远远超出了我们自己的底线。
这是无端的、愚蠢的恶意破坏。

sentences.en: "Tis strange how my memory doth wanton with me these days," said Tom.
sentences.cn: “真奇怪，这几天我的记忆总是在和我开玩笑。”汤姆说。
